players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked by Diana's sudden death. We should all be on high alert and work together to find out who did this."
Bob: "I think we should investigate Diana's body and see if there are any clues."
Charlie: "Bob, I think we should investigate Diana's body and see if there are any clues."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or suspicions we may have about Diana's death. Let us work together and trust in the power of our collective knowledge to uncover the truth."
